data.title: 8 Things We're Excited About For Ari Lennox's Sophomore Album
data.meta_description: Calling all Ari Lennox fans! Her sophomore album is in the works and the anticipation is real! Here's 8 reasons why we're excited!
data.text:
Our good sis Ari Lennox is diligently working to deliver an amazing sophomore album for her fans this year. Preparation for this album has been in the works since 2020 and Ari promises fans that it will be released soon. With over 80 songs to choose from we’re sure our R&B queen will deliver a masterpiece that will guide us through summer 2022!

Lennox just recently cut ties with her management team, Black Wax, who has represented her for a decade and she’s stepping into a new era and chapter of her life. Here are 8 reasons why we’re so excited for the album and can’t wait to blast her highly anticipated album over and over again!
